full_text: The best thing a parent can do is make sure their kid is comfortable and distracted. Anyone on a flight should assume kids will be on it and bring their own distractions. IMO, goodie bags are a dumb idea, and a waste of time/money. https://t.co/uwqfolpYCU
Twitter does need to be reformed, in that they should kick off the Nazis. It does NOT need Elon Musk to buy it out and do who knows what with it. https://t.co/hKZthKr6tj

This is gross, horrifying and disgusting. Propaganda from Fox News and rhetoric from the GOP (specifically people like Boebert, Gaetz, and Greene) are causing actual damage to children. CHILDREN. Otherizing the LGBTQ+ community is unacceptable. https://t.co/lGZRp3b94P
